title: oc5.0.10 - apps setting main window shows unrequired scrollbar
body:
## expected behaviour

if you are opening the apps setting dialog the main window should be sized properly without a scrollbar for the main window. a scrollbar is already shown in the apps frame if the number of apps is greater than the number of apps which can be shown on own page.

## actual behaviour

two scrollbars are displayed, one for the main window and a second one for the apps frame which puzzles the user.

## steps to reproduce

1. open settings -> apps

![20130908_owncloud_apps_setting_scrollbar](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1103195/aa881112-188e-11e3-8ee4-a087a210e042.png)

## environment

#### server configuration

os: linux 2.6.24-24
web server: apache/ 2.4.6
database: mysql
php version: 5.4.19
owncloud version: 5.0.10

#### client configuration

browser: firefox 23.0.1
operating system: windows 7
